channel.title: [Aggroth] - Redoing Aggroth - Completely
channel.description:
[b]Hello Mopar.[/b]
Since i've had alot of free time on my hands right now, i decided to kind-of redo Aggroth a bit. Over 20K views is on Aggroth V2 now, so i guess people really like Aggroth. I did too... Which is why it sucked that i had to stop. I will be redoing everything from a clean Netty PI now. I will post daily updates.
[b]Logs:[/b] [code] Updates 2015-1-5 & 6
Special?
No.
=============
-Added a sort of karma system in our respect skill. -There's 2 sides you can go- Good, and Bad. -2 Places where you can train Respect by killing NPC's and returning (lost) items. -Check the respect spoiler all the way to the bottom for more information. [/code]
[code] Updates 2015-1-4
Special? Yes, our first unique skill was introduced.
=============
-Added the Respect skill to the HighScores to replace Dungeoneering -Added NPC's in the desert city -Found a new area: Desert City, to make the first area -Respect cape (By Naseem) was added -Respect experience was added -Added dialogues and actions to the npc's we added for Respect skill -Added correct experience to the respect skill -Decided a beer would be good to gain 10k experience [/code] [code] Updates 2015-1-3
Special? No.
=============
-A achievements system has been added and works good for now -Magic and Ranging has been added -Prayer has been finished -PETS HAVE BEEN ADDED - INCLUDING OLDSCHOOL PETS - All by Ryan Phillips! -Dragonfire shield has been finished -Equipment screen has been finished [/code]
[code] Updates 2015-1-1
Special? No.
=============
-Finished rockcrabs training area -Finished hill giants training area -added drops to rockcrabs -added drops to hill giants -redid the spawning system -redid the entire drop system -customised the drop system [/code]
[code] Updates 2014-12-28
Special? No.
=============
-Created a new website -Added Aggroth's HighScores system -Added Aggroth's AutoDonate system -Added Aggroth's Wiki system -Added Aggroth's Forums system -Did some minor changes to weapon animations -Fixed the skilltab with many thanks to Zion. [/code]
[code] Updates 2014-12-23
Special? Yes, today is the day we started setting up the website.
=============
-We have bought a .com domain. -We have bought a webhost - DDOS Protected -Forums have been setup -DDoS Protection has been finished setting up[/code]
[code] Updates 2014-12-22
Special? No.
=============
-Redone all of the existing skills -Fixed a bug where it was impossible to bury a bone - it would cause a Thread-4 Error. -Fixed a packaging bug where we had shit loads of fake errors -Fixed a bug where ... everyone could login without using a password? o.O
=============
-Added Thieving 90% -Added/ Finished woodcutting - 100% -Added Fishing - Untested -Added firemaking - Not working -Added cooking - Working 100% with "Cook X and Cook all" options. -Added fletching - Working 100% -Added herblore - Untested -Added mining - untested[/code]
[code] Updates 2014-12-21
Special? Yes, added a fully functional Christmas event where "Santa Claus" gives away his armour (except for santa hat (1050)) and made it so you can only take one set every character.
============= -Magic tab has been changed alot -Removed AutoCasting as it doesnt fit the server... And i never liked that feature. -Added LIT up teleportation buttons -Added a woodcutting base -Fixed woodcutting base -Added a "stumps" base, works fine but looks like shit atm -Added a "Monster Teleportation" button with dialogue and teleport actions -Ripped 'Prothlythe's' login system, i liked it. -Fixed an issue where playerheads wouldn't move... [/code]
[code] Updates 2014-12-20:
Special? Yes, today was the day we started redoing Aggroth.
============= Worked on the bank ALOT. -Added bank all equiped items -Added bank all button twice as fast as the previous one -Added "Go to equipmentscreen" button -Attempted to fix equipmentscreen, alot of bugs with it. we fixed how it froze when you hovered over it, but the character is still gone. -Added 100% noting and unnoting, somehow it wasnt there... ========================= -Added a prayer system -Added a combat system -Added npc and player heads in dialogues -Added 100% torva effect [/code]
[b]Progress[/b]
(Red = Uncompleted) (Orange = Almost finished) (Green = Completed)
===================================
[i]Physical looks, maps, interfaces, gfx, animations, etc.[/i] -Added 508 maps -Added 667 animations -Added 602 items -Added new bank interface -Added new character screen -Fixed weird black squares on floors -Fixed AGS special attack + animation -Fixed Unarmed giving wrong EXP -Added a prayer system -Tested combat system (Melee) -Tested combat system (Ranging) -Tested combat system (Magic) -Added 100% clipping -Added 14 ranks instead of 3 -Fixed icon 2 having same icon as icon 3 -Adding fully working 602+ npcheads in dialogues -Adding 100% torva effect with health decreasing -Adding lit up teleport buttons -Adding cachedownloader that actually unzips too..
[i]NPCS, shops, etc.[/i]
[i]SQL related, host, and website related[/i] -Buying a domain -Adding Highscores -Adding Automatic Donating -Adding Automatic Voting -Buying a VPS | Dedi
[b]*Skilling*[/b]
[i]Woodcutting -Correct axes for correct trees -Correct animations with looping -Stop chopping when inventory is full -Correct timer -Correct EXP -Added stumpts functional -Did something about ugly stumps -Fixed the issue where a player could walk away and still chop wood -Fixed an issue where the player would continue chopping even though inventory was full -Functioning bird nests with random timer[/i]
Firemaking [i]-Finished[/i]
Herblore [i]-Started[/i]
Fishing [i]-Started[/i]
Mining [i]-Started[/i]
Prayer [i]-Added every prayer with correct bonuses and levels -Added bones on altars [color=red]-Added curses (Probably not going to be added) -Added bones burying (had a bug)[/i]
Respect -Added npc's -Added beers giving 10k experience through ClickingButtons -Added actions -Added dialogues -Added correct xp -Added to highscores
More coming soon!
[b]Media[/b]
[b]Christmas has come to Aggroth Redone![/b] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z0JbVuFaOSQ[/youtube]
[spoiler] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/ab88bf84f737ab3770b222404101d744.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/9990d1cb68223614c67dcc390a1fb354.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/140ecdbf63ac0e5d470e03b417a86983.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/19e1ed3738e87a34301248c955615492.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f4df301c45675306a5bebe9a172f7593.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/4e782b1cbb89194d4070d6beb45dfb81.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/4d7f902ecc0a08fbc82931550e801818.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/98a574b0b0923b5ffa4429745eb9d3b6.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5bbd4df52c5c4f2da5dcd9f20cfdcf57.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/aae5ab43ba0d1b3fdf5e2f7a8704e0dd.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f9c6500a5dcf16c9f23feb44a05df8b2.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f28e55024737a4e1a7ad398311f00992.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/cdee9c8f58f047fbb403c578970c715c.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5571c8d5a1c19e4f6c4777adc8c33b58.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/56bb5020de5374b2293c4506dfe3a30f.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/ea8d92aad7ff12188d5736f4aaa18149.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/16bba37b13ed3983faabd1bad58624ca.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e9bc456b09327cc67dae4aed8c5047b2.gif[/img] [/spoiler]
[b]Joining the project[/b]
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,667498.0.html]Join Project Aggroth Redone by clicking here.[/url]
Credits: -Thrallix -Zion -Brian
[b]Staff team[/b] Coming Soon.
[$]Funders[$]: Ryan G Prism Mrbad315
[b]Unique Skills[/b] [spoiler] [b]Respect[/b] [spoiler] This skill is called 'Respect'. You can gain respect EXP by helping npc's around Aggroth. Currently one area is finished.
Storyline:
Area one:
A mean king has conquered a small desert city in Al-Kharid. His guards are ordered to keep an eye on his workers, who are mining the roads, and the rest of the city. They are working in a desert, and what's better then a cold beer when you're thirsty and tired, right? The guards have more beer then they need, so your task is to kill the guards to gain their beer. Killing guards will give you 500 respect experience. When you gain a beer, (1:5), you can give the beer to one of the hard workers. Because they know you, and respect you, you will gain 10.000 respect experience.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/37165ab9cda5e704142b802b595e5660.gif[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a5af7af95b363121937a231cd4faad08.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/ba4567a2a69cebf1d735bb75ddc2c2a2.png[/img]
